chaos.title: The current chaos
chaos.subtitle: Freelancing is a minefield.
chaos.description: Email contracts. Unsecured payments. Inconsistent invoices in spreadsheets. Clients risk penalties for misclassification, while professionals risk non-payment. It's a gamble, not a business.

infrastructure.title: The infrastructure vision
infrastructure.subtitle: We don't sell freelancers. We sell certainty.
infrastructure.description: We built a unified legal wrapper. Trustora is not just a marketplace; it is the security infrastructure between money and delivery. Stripe + digital notary + marketplace in one place.

mechanism.title: The trust mechanism
mechanism.subtitle: Smart escrow & total verification.
mechanism.description: Funds are locked in segregated accounts before kickoff. Identity is verified biometrically. Contracts include automatic IP transfer. Nothing is left to chance.

success.title: The new reality
success.subtitle: Where work meets trust.
success.description: An ecosystem where payments are guaranteed and work is legally protected. No fear. No administrative risk. Just focus on delivery and performance.
